Description: Gene that the resource is related to
Clone ID for the mono-clonal antibody
Species from which the antibody is derived, such as mouse, rabbit
ID of post translational modification recognized and location (e.g. phospho-Thr156)
Catalog ID of antibody from vendor
Name of vendor antibody was obtained from
State whether antibody is mono or polyclonal
Genus and species of target antibody if secondary
ID of specific domain targeted, if known
UniProt ID of target protein if primary
External link to published images relevant for the current Pharos page
Physical repository from which resource can be purchased
External link to physical and/or digital repositories containing key metadata and ordering information for the resource
Identifier as registered by a repository
Experiments and assays for which the antibodies have been tested and validated
